评论概述: Not perfect but good for the price.
评论详情: Fabric is thick and soft. Detail is bright and well applied. Perfectly oversized (I'm an xl and I got a 2x). No closure though, so I'm getting a shawl clip for it. Warm and soft material, kind of feltish but stronger. The hood is huge and cute. All in all a good buy for the money!

I'm 5'2" 145 lbs. I typically wear a size 5, so I got the medium. It's perfectly oversized. It's so comfortable, I could see myself wanting to sleep in this. It's super soft on the inside, and feels like a typical hoodie on the outside, somewhat shiny material. I love it and highly recommend it especially for the price.
Super soft  perfect robe
Super cozy and soft, nicer quality than expected. I love it.

It's just felt so dont expect it to be super durable, I feel it could use pockets but would be easy to alter. Doesn't hang off your body to points in the front as pictured. Doesn't mean I don't like it though. Great value.
The long moon themed hoodie is warm and comfy. It fits as expected and is roomy and flowy

Looks gorgeous but fits way on the smaller side. This is definitely not true to size, what should look over sized on me ended up looking a bit more snug. It won't come to far over my chest but it's still a nice enough piece that I have worn with some basic maxi dresses. It's super light so don't expect to keep too warm in this alone. The hood is probably my favorite part because that IS as oversized as it looks on the model.

This is definitely a Black Craft Cult knock off and the quality is just so so.  The materiel isn’t typical sweatshirt material.  It has a bit of a sheen like Halloween costume fabric, so it comes off kind of cheap.  It’s also cut funny.  It has a huge good but a more fitted body that sort of pulls to the back.  It looks a little awkward and doesn’t really look like the fit of the model.  I ordered size Large and I’m a curvy 155lbs on a 5’2” frame.  It fits a little large and the sleeves are long and awkwardly wide.  There are no pockets as described.  I will say that the screen printing is really nice.  It’s thick but not stiff and the edges are sharp.

评论概述: Love this hoodie , super comfy and soft
评论详情: Love this hoodie so much it's so comfortable so soft nicely lined and just the right length. It's lightweight but warm super soft on the inside great stitching the decals on the hoodie are very nice and good quality. The hood covers your entire head and gives a dramatic outline over your face. The length is perfect you can wear it with address, skirt, shorts, and jeans. It doesn't have any pockets or zippers but I have no issue with that. I definitely sized up to a 4xl as some of the reviews I read said that it was on the smaller size in regard to fitting. I'm glad I did get the 4XL because it fits beautifully. The stretching is really nice and professionally done. No funky smell and I definitely will be buying for my daughters who are in there early twenties as they are trying to steal it from me LOL.

评论概述: Have the original sellers, and this isn't a good dupe for it.
评论详情: If you have owned the original from black craft I believe, this isn't the best dupe, if I didn't own black crafts I'd give it 5 stars. It's no a symmetrical, and the black craft one in sown in a way where it flows very nicely with your body. This one has no flow, it also is alot bigger than I was expecting. I could of sided down one or two sizes. I does have similar to even the exact graphics on it. Bur that's about the only similarity

评论概述: no complaints for $10, jacket is NICELY made overall
评论详情: I had concerns that this wouldn't turn out as well. But also, you really can't complain considering how low the price is. But surprisingly, this hoodie's quality is worth more than they're charging! It's not going to be nike quality material sweatshirts but it feels weighty, very well stitched and the design of the overall jacket looks pretty amazing. The oversized hood looks good. I don't think it looks inferior at all. There's literally no flaws on the jacket and it has zero manuf smell best of all. As far as the thickness, if you hold it up to the light, it's' not going to black out lights. Wearing this hoodie with a thin long sleeve inside felt really warm for me. The sizing is perfect for me in a medium. I'm actually really happy with it and can't wait to wear it out. I have to ding it one star though because there are no pockets as advertised. This is the coolest hoodie you're gonna get for $10.

This hoodie COULD be better - it has a lot going for it, the design with the gothic moons and it is an open sweatshirt - meaning no zipper, and it is long. However, I found the material to be lacking somewhat for a sweatshirt. It is thiner and doesn't seem to be sweatshirt material. There is no stretch and it does run on the small size, which I was surprised by.  If the material could be more like sweatshirt material and make this run more true to size, it would be a winner.

This gothic hoodie has such a unique look and vibe! I was worried it might be a cheap costume like material, but it's actually a little nicer quality than I expected and something that can hold up to repeated wear. Fits as expected and looks good. I do wish it had some sort of closure and maybe pockets, but for the price it's a nice item.

I'm not completely sold on the feel and sheen of this item - I like cotton and natural fibers a lot more, but the deep black and contrasting white "gothic" motifs are striking. Long, too long for me,  and open, no closure, as shown. If you want to stay cozy while looking witchy, this is an option, but feels a bit costumey.
This was a huge hit with  my goth loving kid. It is hooded and thick cotton like material. Cozy and warm.

This hoodie looks like at the picture, no bad surprises as shorter length or different pattern. You have to know it doesn't have a zipper but you can't see it at the pictures neither so you will get exactly what you see. Fabric is not thick but not thin either, it holds it's shape and looks pretty cool with any outfit. A great piece for gothic princesses and princes!

评论概述: Nice Hoodie but item do not match with description provided for the item, no pockets, no zipper!
评论详情: I recently ordered this hoodie for my daughter, and she really likes it. The prints are clear and the hoodie itself is well-made. However, there are some discrepancies between the description and the actual product.  The description states that it's a "Women Gothic Zip Up Oversized Moon Hoodie Sweatshirt Long Sleeve Coat Punk Jacket with Pockets." However, the hoodie we received, while resembling the one in the promotional picture, lacks both pockets and a zipper. Furthermore, during my research, I found the exact same piece, with identical pictures, available for a much cheaper price on other websites. This pricing inconsistency is disappointing.  Considering these discrepancies, I have to remove 3 stars from my rating for this product. While the hoodie itself is nice and my daughter enjoys it, the misleading description and pricing concerns leave much to be desired in terms of transparency and value for money.

This oversized hoodie is well made, and I like the design. It is nicely oversized, my model (my sister) usually wears a xxl, and this hoodie fit her just a little tight. I am.disappointed that there aren't pockets, also the material holds on to hair and strings. Just be aware of that, especially if you have pets.

This hoodie was okay. It did not wow me. The material itself felt quite thin and flimsy to me compared to other hoodies that I have. The printing was very clear and popped, which I liked. I was very disappointed that there were no pockets. This jacket is perfectly fine, I just did not find it to be particularly special.

This is very well made and looks great on. It is comfortable to wear and looks exactly as you woukd expect from the photos. I really like the material and design, but I do wish it had pockets. It says it has pockets, but if they are there, I definitely could not find them.  Other than the pocket confusion, this is absolutely perfect. It keeps you warm, but it isn't too thick.  I am still very happy with this and would recommend it to others. It would also make a wonderful gift as well.

I like this hoodie. I normally wear a size small or medium in my clothes. However, I liked this so much that I ordered the only size they had at the time, which was a 4x. I actually loved how the oversized hoodie looks on me. The hood framed my face well also. It seems cozy, and I can see this being worn around the home, to an event, or outside. I can see many different looks with this hoodie and I'm glad I got this.

Stiff and thin. It would be nice is the price point wasn't so high. It's clearly a knock off and the display image is of the original. The display photos make it seem like it is a higher quality fabric.
Love this sweater size was perfect and it’s nice for fall
This sweater does NOT have a zipper.
